Question: This person has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, at the 6500 block of Hollywood Boulevard.
Hints: Gerald McBoing-Boing (1950), which was based on an original story by this person, won the Academy Award for Animated Short Film.
This person, he also authored over a dozen books as Theo LeSieg and one as Rosetta Stone.
This person, was a mix of live-action and puppetry by Jim Henson Television, the producers of The Muppets.
